Well I I think we have neighborhood watch

And I guess most of the crime that Im concerned about generally is against my kids Its scary to send them off down the street few houses should this end the slash unit

turns.text: To let them go play with someone and --

I would too if I had kids We dont have any We did install uh motion detector light back in our driveway
And that was mainly it was so when we pulled up the light would come on but also we have boat back there --

-- crime but uh weve been real lucky that no one in my family with the anywhere that they live has had been victim of you know serious crime
But uh its really scary to know that you can live normal life and try to be good citizen --

But I guess I take lot of uh little bit of uh safety in knowing that lot of the crimes that they report are like drug related or --

And uh theres not so much of it completely innocent --
